jp.go.aist.six.oval.repository

Interface OvalRepository

  • All Superinterfaces:
    OvalDefinitionRepository, OvalResultRepository
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    HttpOvalRepositoryClient, OvalRepositoryImpl

    public interface OvalRepository
extends OvalDefinitionRepository, OvalResultRepository
    A prescription of the OVAL repository basic operations. This repository supports any type of OVAL objects.
    Version:
    $Id: OvalRepository.java 3046 2013-02-21 09:33:57Z nakamura5akihito@gmail.com $
    Author:
    Akihito Nakamura, AIST
    See Also:
    OVAL Use Case Guide
